scripts.build:check: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),c=require('crypto');const a=fs.readFileSync('mgtools.user.js');const b=fs.readFileSync('dist/mgtools.user.js');const ha=c.createHash('sha256').update(a).digest('hex');const hb=c.createHash('sha256').update(b).digest('hex');if(ha!==hb){console.error('❌ Build mismatch');process.exit(1)}console.log('✅ Build matches source')"
